question: Which of the following testing techniques allows the tester to design test cases ONLY based on the software requirements, without relying on the software's source code?
The concept of REQUIREMENTS SPECIFICATION, that is
option: A. Requirements are written in natural language about the services that the system must provide
B. Requirements are written in specialized language to describe the software in detail
C. Requirements are specified by context diagrams, graphs and relational diagrams,...
D. Services are specified in detail and precisely so that they can be used as the basis for a contract between two parties
answer: D. Services are specified in detail and precisely so that they can be used as the basis for a contract between two parties

question: Which requirement is a functional requirement?
option: A. Warn users when the free space on the disk is 20%
B. Perform operations to add, view, delete, edit business data
C. Immediately warn of system errors
D. Require system time to be reset every time you work
answer: B. Perform operations to add, view, delete, edit business data

question: Which of the following is a functional requirement?
option: D. None of the above mentioned requirements
answer: D. None of the above mentioned requirements
